name: Black Hole
description:
Near the galactic core, you find a beacon indicating that an ancient civilization hid one of their worlds {{url_for("blackhole.img")}} within a nearby black hole. Is this what passes for intergalactic humor, or is there actually something in there?

The disk image can be found on the shell machines at {{directory}}/blackhole.img and the contents of the image are available in {{directory}}
hints: ls -b will help you get past the first hurdle.  Good luck and godspeed.
author: John Davis
